dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 69 IH: Nullify Occupational Safety and Health Administration Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Biggs introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To abolish the Occupational Safety and Health Administration, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Nullify Occupational Safety and Health Administration Act or the NOSHA Act.
The Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 is repealed. The Occupational Safety and Health Administration is abolished.
